replies.msg:
有時買買下佢話我：
Order Messages
This account does not have sufficient funds to cover the cost of this order, including any open orders you might have currently. If you would like to place this trade, please reduce the total amount of this order. (AC338)
但我account有多過25000，點解唔可以無限trade？
一定要等T+2之後先可以再買？

quote.msg:
有時買買下佢話我：
Order Messages
This account does not have sufficient funds to cover the cost of this order, including any open orders you might have currently. If you would like to place this trade, please reduce the total amount of this order. (AC338)
但我account有多過25000，點解唔可以無限trade？
一定要等T+2之後先可以再買？

replies.msg: You have placed an open order pending for execution , by default system earmarks your cash so no further trade can be entered.
